name: Active Shooter
description:
ACTIVE SHOOTER TRAINING SIMULATOR

Red Bull™ has partnered up with your local school district to try and put some fun into active shooter scenario training! With simple mechanics resembling that of the hip video game Slender: 8 Pages, you and your classmates will be able to learn some of the fundamental skillsets required in surviving an active shooter scenario, such as:

     - Keeping as much distance between you and the shooter as possible

     - Staying out of the shooter's line of sight

and, to act as a marker of success:

     - Collecting each one of the shooter's manifesto pages hung up around the school

How to play:

     - WASD to move, SHIFT to run

     - LEFT MOUSE BUTTON to collect items

     - Press R to restart

     - ESC or CTRL to exit the game

Got all 6 pages? Great! DO NOT exit the game until you have a teacher mark you down as completed!  Thank you.
